name: Line Wobbler Advance
overview: Line Wobbler Advance is a demake of Robin Baumgarten's Line Wobbler that started as a demo for Synchrony NYC demoparty. It includes remakes of the original Line Wobbler levels and an advance mode with 15 new levels. Advance mode is a series of levels by designers creating their of visions of the Line Wobbler universe. Most of the levels are harder than the originals and require a lot of retries. These levels introduce variations on the core mechanics, cinematic interludes and new elements, such as reactive A.I.
